name: The Grace Dining Table
description: This large rectangular dining table is an iconic Davidson best-seller drawing strong inspiration from the glamorous Art Deco period of the last century. This dining table can be finished in any of Davidson's beautiful timber or lacquer finishes and is available in different sizes. This pedestal dining table features two shaped Art Deco style pedestals all standing on smart facetted bases boasting an impressive eye for proportion. Inject extra glamour to the Grace by gilding the pedestal central blocks in gold leaf or add an extra metal trim to the table top in nickel or brass. This designer dining table would elevate any dining room to new heights of sophistication and leads the way alongside some of the best quality dining room furniture in the UK.
